extendedInfo.description: Welcome to Dream Ranch, you are only taps away from growing your own crops, raising animals and investing in "makers" to produce your own cheese, wine and fruit pies! Grow alfalfa to feed cows to make milk, or corn to feed chickens to make eggs. Decorate your ranch to your heart content and buy functional greenhouses where all your crops grow faster and don't spoil! It's easy and simple as 1-2-3. But should you sell your milk, eggs and flour now, or save them to make bread and sell them later for more profit? How do you make these items? Cheese comes from ? Ketchup comes from ? Wine comes from ? Pies comes from ? Bread comes from ? Fabrics comes from ? Honey comes from ? FEATURES: - Over 22 varieties of crops, trees and yummy fruits including mangos, plums, cherries and bananas - Plow, seed and harvest to gain experience and coins - Buy small to huge greenhouses to grow your crops up to 80% faster - Decorate your ranch with over 70 buildings, fences and premium decorations like Old farm trucks, fireplaces and antique lanterns - Expand your ranch and level up to 80+ levels with the help of organic fertilizers - Visit neighbor's ranches and gain experience to become "featured" neighbors- Harvest / Seed through Swipe using Magical Hand.

reviews.title: Wonderful game!
reviews.comment: Awesome ever! I love this app!! Thanks dream ranch your the best!! :-)
reviews.author: Naomi Zacate

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Definitely recommended but I would like to see a share icon where you can give your neighbors stuff you dont need  e.g. if I don\'t need a tree I can choose to sell or give to a friend the same with machinery, animals, everything if possible.
reviews.author: Jennifer Gonzalez

reviews.title: INTERESTING...!     More STRATEGIES.... PLEASE !!!
reviews.comment: LOVE it! But there\'s still to fix. Your application to your PROGRAMs...Your MAGIC  HAND....!    I\'m not a computer programmer expert. But I Like d GAME very much..!  THANK U.... :-)  LOVE d MAGIC HAND....
reviews.author: Teresa Zacate

reviews.title: Frustrating
reviews.comment: Am I the only one who has this new annoying order board with no orders on it?
reviews.author: T Raitor

reviews.title: Love it but...
reviews.comment: Wonderful game!! the only thing I don\'t understand is why do I spend $ on RB and I use them on lets say clouds and those clouds are only on one \'new land\'!? I\'d like to put gardens and green houses in storage so I can move them freely as well and the truck keeps scrolling me back to the beginning after I add an item to this ridiculous sale system and ps what happened to the surprises while you put down new seed? I haven\'t gotten any since this frustrating update...
reviews.author: Yazmin Cora

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Great time killer but don\'t understand this new update, how do you get the products from the barn to the order board to complete the orders. It appears that you have to spend the ranch bucks to complete this task ,if so then will be erasing this app real soon.
reviews.author: Thomas Hendley

reviews.title: Great farm game
reviews.comment: Update makes you sell thru diff screen with no search & horrible navigation. 1 star until it\'s fixed.  Prior to 08/28/13: This game has gone from good to great. Everything can be put into storage and moved to different lands.  You get rewards for planting. Search is available for all screens. The events can be won without spending money if you have the time. I love the magic hand lets you plant & harvest by swiping.
reviews.author: Danielle Perkins

reviews.title: Great game, thoughtful update, but...
reviews.comment: A very fun game you can play at your own pace.  Never feel you a forced to spend real money to advance <cough Dreamfish cough>.  Mini games take care of rain clouds.  Just fix new sell feature,  good thought, bad implentation.
reviews.author: Robert Johnson

reviews.title: They ruined it
reviews.comment: I was a loyal player. I loved my ranch. But then they installed a truck in it with the most god awful color sheme you ever saw. They ruined my ranch and although I spent a lot of money on it, I will uninstall it. Stay away from this ap. It is horrible!
reviews.author: Susanna Murrett

reviews.title: No papayas?
reviews.comment: Did ya\' forget to load papayas with the last (truck) update? It\'s not on MY crop list...I even used the search feature, thinking I had missed it in the list...and really? It\'s a quest! You\'re only asking us to grow and sell 8? Something is amiss! The truck thing needs a bit better tutorial...lots of folks are confused, if ya\' read the reviews.
reviews.author: Mj olson

reviews.title: Order board does not work
reviews.comment: Why put an update that does not work. My order board is blank only shows countdown. So I can\'t participate please fix
reviews.author: Denise Osborn

reviews.title: Dream Ranch
reviews.comment: Loved this game til yesterday. What were you thinking? Now when I want to sell something I have a new screen that I have to scroll thru. Grr! Please go back to the old way of selling. I\'d like my game to be like it was prior to 8/29/13.
reviews.author: Sharon Galkowski

reviews.title: Parts of update buggy
reviews.comment: All around a great game. However, with the new update, selling becomes a monumental task. As you scroll thru your items it skips back and makes it almost impossible to get to the end of the list. Anyone else having issues like that?
reviews.author: Wes Winkler

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: I love this game
reviews.author: Kimberly Tomaszewski

reviews.comment: Great game. Always have exciting quests.. never a dull moment
reviews.author: Barbara Hulse

reviews.title: Loveeee it
reviews.comment: Loveeeee the game been playing 4 a long time just wish clouds and helpers could  go to every land. keep up the gd work
reviews.author: Biggsexxxii Faniel

reviews.title: Hate being treated like a thief!
reviews.comment: I have paid good money for a long time playing this game, was never a bother to support.... I owened 8 LG. Green houses. deleted one by mistake, checked there help tab. There\'s nothing there on restoring an item, or your game, emailed support for help. OOPS my bad! I put down I had 6 green houses instead of 8 & they certainly picked up on this error, they didn\'t check that I had purchased 8 along time ago, or see my field shows its jammed packed except for this empty space. Received no help except a remark telling me I was wrong in how many I have???  There as bad as Dream Fish who gave me a free tank after an event, but pushed back my exp. Points that was nearing me earning one. I can\'t take this bull much longer!!!! Grrrrrrrrr..... wish I could give both no stars. Am deaf, so I can\'t call them. So I asked to hear from a supervisor. I don\'t think they have any....
reviews.author: Tammy Coulter

reviews.title: Dream ranch
reviews.comment: The best!
reviews.author: Bk Chua

reviews.comment: Awesome game. A game to relax to.
reviews.author: Missy Orlando

reviews.comment: Love this game
reviews.author: Jojo Seddell
